name: Star Explorer - A Space Shooter Game (Beta)
name_original: Star Explorer - A Space Shooter Game (Beta)
description:
This game is still being build so there might be quite a lot of bugs.
It will be best if you play the game in full screen.
Controls:
Drag the spaceship with the mouse to move it.
Tap the spaceship to fire laser.
Theme:
You have to destroy the asteroids by firing laser and every time you destroy an asteroid you get 100 points.
If you get hit by an asteroid you lose a life. You have a total of three lives.
If all of your lives are finished you will have to reload the game to play again.
